Articles.Content:
KSP: 1.0.4 Windows 32bit

Problem: Flight results screen is blank, requiring a game restart

Mods Installed:

AB Launchers 1.0

ATM X86 Basic 5.0

Adjustable Landing Gear 1.2.0

Airlock 1.0.1

Animate Emissive Module 1.11

ASET Props 1.3

AstroGamer's EnginesPlus Mod 2.0

Astronomer's Visual Pack Interstellar

Bahamuto Dynamics 1.2

BahamutoD Animation Modules 0.6.3

BDArmory 0.9.9.1

BDArmorySorting 1.0.2

Behemoth Aerospace Engineering Large Parts 1.3.3

Better Buoyancy 1.4

Chatterer 0.9.6

Chute Safety Indicator 1.0.2

Clamp-O-Tron APAS 1.0

CollisionFX 3.2

Community Tech Tree 2.1

Crossfeed Enabler 3.3

Distant Object Enhancement 1.6.1

Docking Port Alignment Indicator 6.2

Docking Sounds 1.2

Engine Lighting 1.4

Enhanced Navbal 1.3.6.0

EVE 7-4

EVA Enhancements 1.0.0

EVA Parachutes 1.2

EVAManager 6

Extraplanetary Launchpads 5.2.2

FASA Launch Clamps and Towers 5.34

Federal Productions Flags 0.1

Firespitter 7.1.4

HotRockets 1.0.4.1

Hullcam VDS 0.50

HyperEdit 1.4.1.0

Imporved Chase Camera 1.5.1

Infernal Robotics Model Rework- Core+Expansion 01b

InFlightFlagSwitcher 1.0.0

Reproduction Steps:

Fly anything, crash, and press ESC to get to Flight Results Screen. Screen will be blank, requiring KSP restart.

Log: http://bit.ly/1Mj6FQ6
